Title: Relates to adding an acute children's hospital to the term enhanced safety net hospital
Summary: Adds an acute children's hospital licensed by the department primarily for the provision of pediatric and neonatal services to the term enhanced safety net hospital.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to adding an acute children's hospital to the term enhanced safety net hospital
